availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elhanon W. Jones (Clay County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer. Laurel County, Kentucky, native. Married to Letitia Redman Jones in Clay County, Kentucky, in February 1839. Father of George Jones, Evan Jones, and Daniel Jones. Cooper in Clay County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860. Employed Elizabeth Sutter as a servant in Clay County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, p. 124A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, p. 106.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clay County Marriages, Film 007728054.
KYR-0001-020-0207.
